messages.content:
I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Joe, Kasey, Mark, Viktor

Here are the rules of the game: 6 point scotch, Joe & Viktor taking on Kasey & Mark. $6 each point. Hammers and double hammers allowed.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Joe","pops":[]},{"name":"Kasey","pops":[]},{"name":"Mark","pops":[]},{"name":"Viktor","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Joe","Kasey","Mark","Viktor"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Tommy, Kyle, Joe, Aaron

Here are the rules of the game: 6 point scotch, Joe & Kyle vs Aaron & Tommy. $6/point, goes to $12 once someone goes down $55. Hammers and double hammers allowed each hole.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Tommy","pops":[]},{"name":"Kyle","pops":[]},{"name":"Joe","pops":[]},{"name":"Aaron","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Tommy","Kyle","Joe","Aaron"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Kyle, Scottie, Steve, Kasey

Here are the rules of the game: Steve & Scottie vs Kyle & Kasey in scotch, 8 point game. $2 per point, but ups to $6 after the front 9.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Kyle","pops":[]},{"name":"Scottie","pops":[]},{"name":"Steve","pops":[]},{"name":"Kasey","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Kyle","Scottie","Steve","Kasey"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Who had the longest drive?","answers":["Kyle","Scottie","Steve","Kasey"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Which team had the fewest putts?","answers":["Steve & Scottie","Kyle & Kasey"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}
